Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses temp. rerouted NB: Ida B. Wells, State, Washington & Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Washington & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via Ida B. Wells, State, Washington and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Washington and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Waker
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Washington, State, Ohio & Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State & Adams due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via Washington, State, Ohio and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State and Adams.

Allow extra travel time.
